<h3 id="X13906">X(13906)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL AND INNER-YFF TANGENTS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a+b+c)*(a^3-(b+c)*a^2-(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))*a^2+(a^4-2*(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*a^2+2*(b+c)*b*c*a+(b^2-c^2)^2)*S  :  :  <p>X(13906) lies on these lines: {1,1336}, {6,13964}, {12,13895}, {371,10531}, {485,12115}, {590,5552}, {1587,10269}, {8976,10942}, {8980,12189}, {8981,10679}, {8987,12686}, {8988,12749}, {8991,13094}, {8992,13109}, {8994,12381}, {8995,13121}, {8997,13189}, {8998,13217}, {9540,11248}, {10803,13885}, {10805,13886}, {10834,13889}, {10955,13896}, {10956,13897}, {10958,13898}, {10965,13901}, {11400,13884}, {11509,13887}, {11881,13890}, {11882,13891}, {11956,13900}, {12000,13903}, {12356,13908}, {12430,13909}, {12775,13913}, {12874,13914}, {12905,13915}, {13104,13916}, {13105,13917}, {13118,13918}, {13130,13919}, {13132,13921}, {13134,13879}, {13278,13922}, {13313,13923}, {13716,13920}, {13839,13848}</p>
